startText.text: You wake up on the floor in a dark place. You feel disoriented and cannot recall how you got here. As you look around, you see a few rays light filtering through an opening.

morgueText.text: The room is pitch dark, except for a ray of light that filters through some opening. It is difficult to tell where the light is coming from, but it allows you to see  outlines of shapes. Next to you you observe two rectangular items. Your hand hovers over the one nearest to you.

officeText.text: You enter an office. Mostly empty besides a couple of supplies on a desk.

frontDeskText.text: You get to the front desk area. The front door catches your eye. All the windows are boarded up.

emergencyRoomText.text: You enter the emergency room. Everything is mostly stripped away besides a couple of supplies on the floor.

patientRoomText.text: You enter a medium size room, it contains a bed, some health monitoring equipment and a side table.

hallwayText.text: You are in a hallway, there are several doors, all are locked, however you notice that one of the doors is different. This door has a mechanical keypad; you need a combination in order to open this door.

basementText.text: You enter the room, it feels colder in here. There are a few items scattered around the room: rusted surgical equipment on a tray, an operating table, old dirty gowns and towels. You notice 10 large cabinet door in the far wall, and a locked filing cabinet by the corner of the room.
